item.title: Vote command on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

grats:

omg it worked but can ppl do it over n over n over? if so that sucks is there a way to fix that?

Yes, people can but you can add a timer on it to make it do-able every so minutes.

I have not figured out timers though, sorry.

item.title: Vote command on [pi]

@Mariokillu wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("vote")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com/toplist/index.php?action=vote&id=8407", 12000); c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, AMOUNT); } }

					c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.runelocus.com/toplist/index.php?action=vote&id=8407", 12000);
